DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate non-inferiority clinical efficacy two different drug association treatment acute cutaneous rash child 2 12 year old .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Desloratadine Associated With Prednisolone Oral Solution Versus Dexchlorpheniramine Associated With Betamethasone Cutaneous Rash Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: - double-blind , non-inferiority , prospective , parallel group trial . - Experiment duration : 05 day . - 03 visit ( day 0 , 48 hour day 5 ) . - Efficacy evaluate acute cutaneous rash base symptom score - Adverse event evaluation .
DOC.criteria: Consent patient legal guardian ; Clinical diagnosis acute cutaneous rash define presence erythematous papule healthy skin , different size , itchy fleet Children age 2 11 year 11 month ( 30 kg ) ; Participation clinical trial 30 day prior study entry ; Patients history hypersensitivity desloratadine prednisolone corticosteroid use contraindication ; Patients clinically significant disease cutaneous rash include hematopoietic , cardiovascular , renal , neurological , psychiatric autoimmune disorder ; Patients treatment monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOIs ) ; Patients diagnose dermatosis
